body_html:
I can confirm that I am seeing the same issue. Tensorflow v.1.4.1, and Bazel 0.9.0.

Adding --incompatible_load_argument_is_label=false lets the build process go past this issue, but that's of course not the right fix.
body_text:

Adding --incompatible_load_argument_is_label=false lets the build process go past this issue, but that's of course not the right fix.
body:
I can confirm that I am seeing the same issue. Tensorflow v.1.4.1, and Bazel 0.9.0.

Adding `--incompatible_load_argument_is_label=false` lets the build process go past this issue, but that's of course not the right fix.
